faqs.question: How is this different from other marketing automation tools?
faqs.answer: Unlike traditional tools that just automate tasks, we provide a complete growth methodology with AI-powered optimization. Our system actually thinks and makes decisions to improve your results continuously.

faqs.question: What if I already have marketing tools in place?
faqs.answer: Perfect! We integrate with 500+ existing tools and can often improve their performance by 2-3X. You don't need to replace everything - we make what you have work better together.

faqs.question: How quickly will I see results?
faqs.answer: Most customers see improved lead quality within 2 weeks and measurable ROI improvements within 30-45 days. The AI gets smarter over time, so results compound monthly.

faqs.question: Do I need technical expertise to use this?
faqs.answer: Not at all. Our platform is designed for marketers, not developers. We also provide white-glove setup and a dedicated success manager for the first 90 days.

faqs.question: What's your guarantee?
faqs.answer: We guarantee you'll see at least 2X improvement in lead quality within 60 days, or we'll refund 100% of your investment and help you transition to another solution.
